bibl.title: Artemis' Wanderings in Callimachus' Hymn 3 (vv. 39-97): Comparing Exegetic Texts on Papyri and Medieval Scholia.
Proceedings of the 24th International Congress of Papyrology, Helsinki, 1-7 August, 2004. Volume II
bibl.author: MILLOZZI, Valentina

bibl.note: Concerne P. Ant. I, 20 (= Pack2 187); P. Cair. Inv. 47993 (b) (= Pack2 189); P. Oxy. XX, 2258 (= Pack2 186).
bibl.seg: MILLOZZI Valentina, Artemis' Wanderings in Callimachus' Hymn 3 (vv. 39-97): Comparing Exegetic Texts on Papyri and Medieval Scholia.

Jaakko FRÖSÉN, Tiina PUROLA and Erja SALMENKIVI (Edd.), Proceedings of the 24th International Congress of Papyrology, Helsinki, 1-7 August, 2004. Volume II = Commentationes Humanarum Litterarum. 122, 2, 2007 (Helsinki, 2007) pp. 735-742, 1 tabl., 1 stemma.
